page.title: 19SCOUTING
page.content: {CUBS,SCOUTS,BROWNIES & GUIDES} 1st Raglan Boy Scouts meet each Friday in the Scout Hut at 6-30pm. to 8-30pm.There are many activities including swimming once a month,also sailing lessons.We have 10 miles sponsered walks for charity.We go camping five times a year to local places and also near Mount Snowdon. Boys aged 8-10yrs have Cubs on Thursdays 6-30pm. to 8-00pm.in the Scout Hut.We have walks,barbecues and go camping.We also play games and do badge work.Girl Guides aged 11-14yrs meet on Monday 7-15pm to 9-15pm in the Old school.The uniform is blue and we cook,walk and go camping.Brownies are for girls 7-11yrs.Church Parade for Scouts,Cubs,Guides and Brownies is once a month at Raglan Church.
